content:
Nils Berg, Elsa Beskow and you. 

The year was 1913. Wholesaler Nils Berg and his wife Hanna made a decision. They decided to donate their beloved island Marholmen and build a resting place for the women's working class. Soon, it became a holiday home for families and the couple also built a folk high school that Elsa Beskow decorated with paintings. Nils and Hanna are not left. But their idea lives on. Marholmen is the island where you enrich yourself and fill the soul with energy.
